title: Net exports and foreign exchange markets

content.question: Which of the following will happen to aggregate demand in the United States if the United States dollar appreciates in foreign exchange markets?

choices.label: Aggregate demand will decrease because net exports will decrease.
Aggregate demand will decrease because imports will decrease.
Aggregate demand will increase because exports will increase.
Aggregate demand will increase because imports will decrease.
Aggregate demand will increase because exports will decrease.

content.answer: Aggregate demand will decrease because net exports will decrease.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
